definition: canon/law/standard work of scholarship/literary quotation or allusion/ceremony/to be in charge of/to mortgage or pawn
(phonetic na)/used esp. in female names such as Anna 安娜[An1 na4] or Diana 黛安娜[Dai4 an1 na4]

sentences.english: Athena was the goddess of wisdom and patroness of house holdarts.
sentences.chinese: 雅典娜是智慧女神和家居藝術品的守護女神。

sentences.english: Athene is the goddess of wisdom.
Your Evil side wishes to dominate Sanctuary and Kill Athena.
sentences.chinese: 你的邪惡面希望殺掉雅典娜，統治聖域。

sentences.english: Phevos and Athena represent the link between Greek history and the modern Olympic Games.
sentences.chinese: 費沃斯和雅典娜希臘的歷史和之間的聯繫現代奧運會。

sentences.english: This is not an easy thing to do. Athena died almost two years ago.
sentences.chinese: 這並不容易，雅典娜已經死去兩年了。

sentences.english: Athena produced an olive tree-the symbol of peace and wealth.
sentences.chinese: 雅典娜造了一棵橄欖樹，象徵和平與財富。

sentences.english: Let us offer thanks to our protector, the wise and kind Athene.
sentences.chinese: 讓我們來感謝我們的保佑者，賢明而仁慈的雅典娜神。

sentences.english: The official Athens 2004 mascots, Phevos and Athena, are brother and sister.
sentences.chinese: 雅典娜和費沃斯是2004年雅典奧運會的吉祥物。

sentences.english: The great horse came to a standstill in a quiet corner close by the temple of athene .
sentences.chinese: 這匹大馬停在雅典娜廟旁的一個僻靜的角落。

sentences.english: "Athena" means in Hebrew a "group of woman together".
sentences.chinese: “雅典娜”是指“一羣女人在一起”在希伯來文。

sentences.english: Some of the battles caused Athena to wind up physically beaten.
sentences.chinese: 有些爭鬥以雅典娜肉體上的創痛而結束。

sentences.english: You have been called the reincarnation of Budda and Serve Athena with Pride.
sentences.chinese: 你被稱爲佛祖復活和驕傲的雅典娜。

sentences.english: So, this is the entrance to Parthenon that it was a temple to the goddess, Athena.
sentences.chinese: 這是神廟的入口，這座神廟崇奉雅典娜女神。

sentences.english: Athena salad, fresh tomato, cucumber, mix olives and feta cheese.
sentences.chinese: 雅典娜沙拉，新鮮番茄，黃瓜，混合橄欖和羊乳酪。

sentences.english: Poseidon and Athena7 each wanted the honor.
sentences.chinese: 海神波塞冬和雅典娜女神都想得到這份殊榮。

sentences.english: The spouse may recurrently cheat upon the one with Athena archetype.
sentences.chinese: 雅典娜原型者往往會被配偶欺騙。

definition: Nüwa (creator of humans in Chinese mythology)
Houyi, mythological Chinese archer whose wife was Chang'e

Diaochan (-192), one of the four legendary beauties 四大美女[si4 da4 mei3 nu:3], in fiction a famous beauty at the break-up of Han dynasty, given as concubine to usurping warlord Dong Zhuo 董卓[Dong3 Zhuo2] to ensure his overthrow by fighting hero Lü Bu 呂布|吕布[Lu:3 Bu4]
Daji (c. 11th century BC), concubine of the last Shang dynasty king Zhou Xin 紂辛|纣辛[Zhou4 Xin1]
Dracula, novel by Bram Stoker/Vlad III, Prince of Wallachia (1431-1476), nicknamed Vlad the Impaler or Dracula
Bai Qi (-258 BC), famous general of Qin 秦國|秦国, the victor at 長平|长平 in 260 BC/same as 公孫起|公孙起
Lu Ban, legendary master craftsman, called the father of Chinese carpentry
